cosc345.app.model

Class Note

  • java.lang.Object
    • cosc345.app.model.Note
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Comparable<Note>
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    PlayableNote

    public class Note
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.lang.Comparable<Note>
    Represents a musical note.

    • Constructor Detail

      • Note

        public Note(double frequency)

      • Note

        public Note(double frequency,
            Note.NoteLength noteLength)
        Create a musical note based on a frequency.
        Parameters:
        frequency - the frequency (in Hertz) to use.
        noteLength - the length of the note (e.g. crotchet).

      • Note

        public Note(java.lang.String name)
        Create a crotchet length note from a note name.
        Parameters:
        name - the name of the note that follows the format (Note Letter)[#|b](Octave). For example a note name may look like: A#3 or Db4.

      • Note

        public Note(java.lang.String name,
            Note.NoteLength noteLength)
        Create a musical note from a string.
        Parameters:
        name - the name of the note that follows the format (Note Letter)[#|b](Octave). For example a note name may look like: A#3 or Db4.
        noteLength - the length of the note (e.g. crotchet).

      • Note

        public Note(Note note)
        Create a note as a copy of another Note object.
        Parameters:
        note - the Note object to be copied.

        public static int octave(int halfStepDistance)
        Calculate the octave of a note based on its distance in half steps from A4.
        Parameters:
        halfStepDistance - the distance in half steps of the note from A4.
        Returns:
        the octave of a note.

      • halfStepDistance

        public static int halfStepDistance(double frequency)
        Calculate the distance in half steps of a note from A4 based on a given frequency.
        Parameters:
        frequency - the frequency of the note.
        Returns:
        the distance in half steps from A4.

      • frequency

        public static double frequency(int halfStepsDistance)
        Calculate the frequency of a note given its distance in half steps from A4.
        Parameters:
        halfStepsDistance - the number of half steps from A4
        Returns:
        the frequency of the note in Hertz. This is the frequency assuming perfect pitch.

                               double referenceFrequency)
        Calculate the distance between two notes in cents.
        Parameters:
        frequency - the frequency of the measured note.
        referenceFrequency - the frequency of the reference note.
        Returns:
        the distance between the two notes in cents.

      • centDistance

        public static int centDistance(Note actual,
                               Note reference)
        Calculate the distance between two notes in cents.
        Parameters:
        actual - the measured note.
        reference - the reference note.
        Returns:
        the distance between the two notes in cents.

      • centDistanceClamped

        public static int centDistanceClamped(double frequency,
                                      double referenceFrequency)
        Calculate the distance between two notes in cents.
        Parameters:
        frequency - the frequency of the measured note.
        referenceFrequency - the frequency of the reference note.
        Returns:
        the distance between the two notes in cents, clamped to a value between -50 and 50.

      • centDistanceClamped

        public static int centDistanceClamped(Note actual,
                                      Note reference)
        Calculate the distance between two notes in cents.
        Parameters:
        actual - the measured note.
        reference - the reference note.
        Returns:
        the distance between the two notes in cents, clamped to a value between -50 and 50.
